subject: Baseball
Sports Medicine
lead_paragraph: Catcher Rod Barajas was out of the Mets’ lineup for the series finale against the Phillies because of a wrist injury he sustained trying to block a wild pitch Wednesday.
snippet: Catcher Rod Barajas was out of the Mets’ lineup for the series finale against the Phillies because of a wrist injury he sustained trying to block a wild pitch Wednesday.
